title: SSP2-NPi-calibrate
description: SSP2-NPi-calibrate: This reference policy/baseline scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road.

title: SSP2-NDC
description: SSP2-NDC: This Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. It assumes NPi2025 until 2025 and has start year 2030. The NDC includes all pledged policies even if not yet implemented. It assumes that the moderate and heterogeneous climate ambition reflected in the NDCs at the begining of 2021 continues over the 21st century.

title: SSP2-NDCsy2025
description: SSP2-NDCsy2025: This Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. It assumes NPi until 2020 and has start year 2025.The NDC includes all pledged policies even if not yet implemented. It assumes that the moderate and heterogeneous climate ambition reflected in the NDCs at the begining of 2021 continues over the 21st century.

title: SSP2-NPi
description: SSP2-NPi: This National Policies Implemented (NPi) scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The NPi assumes that policies fail to achieve NDC targets in 2030. Instead, carbon prices are assumed to grow and converge more slowly, leading to emissions trajectories in line with bottom-up studies on the effect of currently implemented policies.

title: SSP2-NPi2025
description: SSP2-NPi2025: This National Policies Implemented (NPi) scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The NPi assumes that policies fail to achieve NDC targets in 2030. Instead, carbon prices are assumed to grow and converge more slowly, leading to emissions trajectories in line with bottom-up studies on the effect of currently implemented policies.

title: SSP2-PkBudg500
description: SSP2-PkBudg500: This climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The stylized climate policy scenario assumes a peak budget of 500 Gt CO2 on total CO2 emissions from 2015 to 2100. This is a 1.5C scenario, peak warming is allowed to be well below 1.5C at median climate sensitivity but returns to values below 1.5C in at least 67 % of scenarios by the end of the century.

title: SSP2-PkBudg650
description: SSP2-PkBudg650: This climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The stylized climate policy scenario assumes a peak budget of 650 Gt CO2 on total CO2 emissions from 2015 to 2100. This is a 1.5C scenario, peak warming is allowed to be at or slightly above 1.5C at median climate sensitivity but returns to values below 1.5C in at least 67 % of scenarios by the end of the century.

title: SSP2-PkBudg1000
description: SSP2-PkBudg1050: This climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The stylized climate policy scenario assumes a peak budget of 1150 Gt CO2 on total CO2 emissions from 2015 to 2100. This is a well below 2C scenario at median climate sensitivity but returns to values below 2C in at least 67 % of scenarios during the whole century.

title: SSP2-EcBudg400
description: SSP2-EcBudg400: This climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The stylized climate policy scenario assumes an end-of-century budget of 400 Gt CO2 on total CO2 emissions from 2020 to 2100. This is a high overshoot scenario with delayed climate policy.

title: SSP2-rollBack
description: SSP2-rollBack: This rollback of climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 3 called Middle of the Road.
